CONFIDENTIAL March 13, 1995 TO: Distribution FROM: Ms. P. S. Cohen SUBJECT: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEW . Shipments for the week were about in line with estimated selling rates across the entire Industry. . The current Q 1 outlook assumes that our FP business will perform in line with LE for the balance of the quarter and that we'll see continued slight softness in Savings performance related to reduced support on Monarch and Best Value and on-going competitive Savings pressure. It also assumes that the existing shortfall (related to January trade buying patterns and retail impact from PM's December/January promotions) will not be recovered in First Quarter. Q1 '95
